VARDESC: I want you to think about your pain in the last month: How many days have you had any pain?
I want you to think about your pain in the last month: How many nights have you slept poorly (trouble falling asleep, waking up during sleep) because of pain?
I want you to think about your pain in the last month: How many days have you had trouble taking care of yourself (dressing, going to the bathroom, showering) because of pain?
I want you to think about your pain in the last month: How many days have you missed school/work because of pain?
I want you to think about your pain in the last month: How many days have you left school/work early because of pain?
I want you to think about your pain in the last month: How many days have you been unable to do things you enjoy because of pain?
I want you to think about your pain in the last month: How many days have you felt sad, mad, or upset because of pain?
